summary.para: Handles loop iteration change events, which occur when a loop within a storyboard begins a new iteration.

param.name: storyboard
param.para: The storyboard to which the loop belongs.

param.name: newIterationCount
param.para: The iteration count for the latest .

param.name: oldIterationCount
param.para: The iteration count for the previous .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

summary.para: Defines a method for handling storyboard loop iteration events.
